recordTypes.name: Zoning Permit
recordTypes.description: REQUIRED for all accessory structures less than 200 square feet IF AND ONLY IF the structures are detached from the primary residence AND if exempt from requiring a Building Permit per the Building Code in effect at the time of application.

recordTypes.name: Contractor Registration
recordTypes.description: Contractors should complete this registration to have your bond and insurance on file with the Engineering Department before filling out a Street Excavation Permit application.  Do it once and only upload bond and insurance again once your policy term expires!

recordTypes.name: Street Excavation Permit Application
recordTypes.description: REQUIRED for any work within the Town of Rocky Hillâ€™s right-of-way.  Not required for work in State or private rights-of-way.  See Street List for more information.
